title: NFL Week 15 Fastest 2 Minutes, Colts Are For Real, Lions Huge Win And Recap Of Every Game
description:
NFL Fastest 2 Minutes kicks us off and we then go through every game from Sunday ( 00:02:04- 00:08:11) Colts/Patriots (00:08:11 - 00:17:30) Steelers/Titans (00:17:30 - 00:31:14) Lions/Cardinals (00:31:14 - 00:47:01) Bucs/Saints (00:47:01 - 00:51:48) Dolphins/Jets (00:51:48 - 00:59:31) Bills/Panthers (00:59:31 - 01:15:01) Cowboys/Giants (01:15:01 - 01:26:59) Texans/Jaguars ( 01:26:59 - 01:33:31) 49ers/Faclons (01:33:31 - 01:43:02) Bengals/Broncos (01:44:25 - 01:48:20) Ravens/Packers (01:48:20 - 02:01:19) Football guy of the week and who's back of the week wraps up the show.Â  (02:01:19 - 02:27:13)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
